statements: SELECT * FROM support_agents;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM support_agents;
SELECT agent_phone FROM support_agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM support_agents WHERE agent_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, agent_email FROM support_agents ORDER BY agent_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_agents WHERE agent_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM support_agents WHERE agent_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM support_agents WHERE agent_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, jsonb_array_length(call_logs) AS log_count FROM support_agents;
SELECT agent_name, agent_phone, agent_email FROM support_agents WHERE agent_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM support_agents;
SELECT agent_id, first_name, last_name FROM support_agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM call_logs ORDER BY call_date DESC;
SELECT agent_id, COUNT(log_id) AS call_count FROM call_logs GROUP BY agent_id;
SELECT * FROM call_logs WHERE call_duration > 10 AND call_description LIKE '%issue%';
SELECT * FROM support_agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM support_agents WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT agent_id, call_date FROM call_logs WHERE call_duration > 10 ORDER BY call_date DESC;
SELECT phone_number, first_name FROM support_agents WHERE agent_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND last_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT * FROM support_agents JOIN call_logs ON support_agents.agent_id = call_logs.agent_id WHERE call_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY call_logs.call_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SupportAgents;
SELECT agent_id, name, email FROM SupportAgents ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT agent_id, name, phone_number FROM SupportAgents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT agent_id, name FROM SupportAgents WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM CallLogs WHERE call_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM SupportAgents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM SupportAgents WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT agent_id, call_date, call_time FROM CallLogs WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT * FROM ContactDetails WHERE agent_id = 2 AND country = 'USA';
SELECT agent_id, address, city, country FROM ContactDetails WHERE city = 'New York' AND agent_id IN (SELECT agent_id FROM SupportAgents WHERE name = 'Alice');
SELECT * FROM support_agents;
SELECT agent_name, email, department FROM support_agents;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM support_agents WHERE department='Customer Support';
SELECT agent_name, email FROM support_agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name FROM support_agents WHERE agent_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM support_agents;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM support_agents WHERE department IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM call_logs ORDER BY call_time DESC;
SELECT agent_id, call_time, call_description FROM call_logs WHERE call_duration > 10;
SELECT support_agents.agent_name, contact_type, contact_value FROM support_agents JOIN contact_details ON support_agents.agent_id = contact_details.agent_id;
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, agent_email FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT call_id, agent_id, customer_name FROM calls WHERE call_duration > 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE agent_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM agents WHERE agent_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT agent_name, COUNT(*) AS total_calls FROM agents JOIN calls ON agents.agent_id = calls.agent_id GROUP BY agent_name;
SELECT agents.agent_name, calls.call_duration AS average_duration FROM agents JOIN calls ON agents.agent_id = calls.agent_id GROUP BY agents.agent_name ORDER BY average_duration DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, call_logs.call_duration FROM customers JOIN call_logs ON customers.customer_id = call_logs.customer_id WHERE call_logs.call_duration > 10 ORDER BY call_logs.call_duration DESC;
